Text:
Dear C_P, thanks for all your shares..however, this episode was already shared by VTV/TVTeam as part of the 2nd season.  And even wikipedia does not mention this one as part of Season 03.  

Nice work though, with your regular shares...keep it up.
love this show thanks a million

This is part of season 3 http://www.tv.com/batman-the-brave-and-the-bold/show/75449/episode.html    wikipedia starts season 3 on episode 4, the first 3 episodes are missing, they are in the wrong category as part of season 2. Thanks for the  upload {C_P}
